name: TheExecutiveLeapwithMikeSudermann
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Mike Sudermann best selling author of The Executive Leap, Breakthrough Strategies to Landing Your Next Top Job, is globally recognized as both a Strategic Search Advisor and Executive Recruiter who is engaged in high priority search assignments to identify and recruit exceptional mid-to-senior level executive talent for start-up to Fortune 500 companies.

As an Executive Search Advisor, Mike wears several hats at once. He is a trusted partner to his clients who are looking to hire exceptional executive level talent and the job search expert that leaders turn to for advice on career moves, job offers, resumes, severance packages, interview strategies, relocation tips, negotiating compensation packages and more.

Through his career he has invested countless hours working with clients on direct hire placements (over 325) and advising professionals on how to land a purposeful and fulfilling new position. As a result of these experiences, studies and candid client feedback, he has developed breakthrough strategies and proven methodologies for helping his clients hire more efficiently and eliminate the fear of making a bad hire while advising executives on how to position themselves as the number one must hire candidate.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
